popover.primary: A mastery path focused on healing and restorative powers
A mastery path focused on melee combat
A mastery path focused on siphoning power from your enemies

data.name: Alignment of Naggaroth
data.description: Spiritual resistance increased by 252.
data.rawDescription: Spiritual resistance increased by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 1464 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Resurrects all groupmates within {COM_1_RADI_FEET}. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for {ABIL_3884_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} over {ABIL_3884_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, and they will deal {ABIL_3876_COM_0_VAL0}% more damage for {ABIL_3876_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Bathing In Blood
data.description: Any time you kill an enemy, you will regain 471 health over 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Any time you kill an enemy, you will regain {ABIL_3260_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} over {ABIL_3260_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Bleed Out
data.description: Increases Lacerate, Sanguinary Extension, and Fell Sacrifice's durations by an additional 6 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Increases Lacerate, Sanguinary Extension, and Fell Sacrifice's durations by an additional 6 seconds.

data.name: Blood Offering
data.description: For the next 5 seconds, you will regain 30 Soul Essence every second.  If you run out of action points or break your concentration, this effect will end.
data.rawDescription: For the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, you will regain {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0} Soul Essence every second.  If you run out of action points or break your concentration, this effect will end.

data.name: Bloodthirst
data.description: Covenant Of Celerity will now deal 225 Spirit damage.
data.rawDescription: Covenant Of Celerity will now deal {ABIL_9559_COM_5_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE}.

data.name: Bound by Blood
data.description: Whenever you directly heal an ally, there is a 25% chance that you will also be healed for 25% of the same amount.
data.rawDescription: Whenever you directly heal an ally, there is a 25% chance that you will also be healed for 25% of the same amount.

data.name: Chant of Pain
data.description: You call upon the Word of Pain, dealing 200 damage every second to all enemies in a 30 feet area around you for the next 4 seconds. Reveling in their agony, you are healed for all damage inflicted by the Word of Pain.
data.rawDescription: You call upon the Word of Pain, dealing {ABIL_3048_COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} every second to all enemies in a {COM_0_RADI_FEET} area around you for the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. Reveling in their agony, you are healed for all damage inflicted by the Word of Pain.

data.name: Cleave Soul
data.description: A potent attack which deals 152 damage to your enemy.
data.rawDescription: A potent attack which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your enemy.

data.name: Consume Enchantment
data.note:
Builds 30 Soul Essence
Target must have an Enchantment
data.description: A shattering attack that removes one Enchantment from your enemy and deals 127 damage.
data.rawDescription: A shattering attack that removes one Enchantment from your enemy and deals {COM_2_VAL0_DAMAGE}.

data.name: Consume Strength
data.description: A Crippling attack which deals 127 damage and reduces your enemy's Strength by 50 for 20 seconds.  Your defensive target's Strength is increased by 50.
data.rawDescription: A Crippling attack which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and reduces your enemy's Strength by {COM_1_VAL0} for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.  Your defensive target's Strength is increased by {COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Consume Thought
data.description: An overwhelming attack which deals 177 damage to your enemy and silences them for 4 seconds, making them unable to use magic.
data.rawDescription: An overwhelming attack which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your enemy and silences them for {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}, making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Covenant of Celerity
data.note: Only one Covenant may be active at a time.
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet of you gain a 20% chance to Cripple anyone that they damage, dealing 125 Spirit damage and reducing the victim's run speed by 20% for 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: All group mates within 100 feet of you gain a 20% chance to Cripple anyone that they damage, dealing {COM_3_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} and reducing the victim's run speed by {ABIL_3262_COM_0_VAL0}% for {ABIL_3262_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Covenant of Tenacity
data.note: Only one Covenant may be active at a time.
data.description: A pact with Khaine that increases the armor of all groupmates within 100 feet of you by 412.
data.rawDescription: A pact with Khaine that increases the armor of all groupmates within 100 feet of you by {COM_1_VAL0}.

data.name: Covenant of Vitality
data.note: Only one Covenant may be active at a time.
data.description: Any time a groupmate within 100 feet of you damages an enemy, they have a 20% chance to deal an additional 125 Spirit damage to their victim, and heal themselves for an equal amount.
data.rawDescription: Any time a groupmate within 100 feet of you damages an enemy, they have a 20% chance to deal an additional {COM_3_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} to their victim, and heal themselves for an equal amount.

data.name: Curse of Khaine
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy with single target damage, all healing used on them for the next 5 seconds will become 50% less effective.
data.rawDescription: Any time you critically hit an enemy with single target damage, all healing used on them for the next {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} will become 50% less effective.

data.name: Dark Blessings
data.description: Direct heals cast on you will recover 10% more health.
data.rawDescription: Direct heals cast on you will recover {COM_0_VAL1}% more health.

data.name: Devour Essence
data.description: You surround yourself or an ally with a devouring aura for up to 5 seconds.  Each second, your ally will deal 101 damage to up to 4 enemies within 10 feet of them, and become healed for 50% of all the damage done.  You will lose 25 Soul Essence each second, and this effect will end if you run out of Soul Essence to power it with.
data.rawDescription: You surround yourself or an ally with a devouring aura for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.  Each second, your ally will deal {ABIL_3367_COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to up to 4 enemies within {COM_3_RADI_FEET} of them, and become healed for 50% of all the damage done.  You will lose {COM_1_VAL1} Soul Essence each second, and this effect will end if you run out of Soul Essence to power it with.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Willpower by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.
data.rawDescription: A strong heal that will restore {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH} to your target.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description: You deal 25% more damage, but all of your casted heals become 20% less effective.
data.rawDescription: You deal {COM_0_VAL0}% more damage, but all of your casted heals become {COM_1_VAL1}% less effective.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.
data.rawDescription: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} that will absorb up to {COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE} from melee abilities.

data.name: Efficient Patching
data.description: Patch Wounds will now remove one Ailment or Hex for the entire group.
data.rawDescription: Patch Wounds will now remove one Ailment or Hex for the entire group.

data.name: Empowered Transfer
data.description:
The healing from lifetaps are increased by 25%.

When wearing a shield Consume Essence will hit up to two additional enemies within 25ft of your target.
data.rawDescription:
The healing from lifetaps are increased by 25%.

When wearing a shield Consume Essence will hit up to two additional enemies within 25ft of your target.

data.name: Essence Lash
data.description: You lash out at all opponents in front of you up to 50 feet away, dealing 101 damage and regaining 15 Soul Essence for each enemy hit.
data.rawDescription: You lash out at all opponents in front of you up to {COM_0_RADI_FEET} away, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and regaining 15 Soul Essence for each enemy hit.

data.name: Fell Sacrifice
data.description: Cripples all targets within 30 feet of you for 584 damage over 24 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Cripples all targets within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} of you for {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Fist of Khaine
data.description: You call forth the wrath of Khaine, dealing 102 Spirit damage to your target.
data.rawDescription: You call forth the wrath of Khaine, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} to your target.

data.name: Flay
data.description: You flay your target for 177 damage.  If target is Crippled, they are further Crippled as they become snared, reducing their run speed by 40% for 6 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You flay your target for {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}.  If target is Crippled, they are further Crippled as they become snared, reducing their run speed by {COM_1_VAL0}% for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.
data.rawDescription:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.
data.rawDescription: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Fueled Actions
data.description: Whenever you are hit by an enemy, you have a 25% chance to gain 35 Soul Essence.  Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Whenever you are hit by an enemy, you have a 25% chance to gain {ABIL_317_COM_0_VAL0} Soul Essence.  Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Gift of Khaine
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy with an ability from the Path Of Sacrifice, your defensive target will regain 60 Action Points.  You may not grant action points to yourself with this effect.  Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Any time you critically hit an enemy with an ability from the Path Of Sacrifice, your defensive target will regain {COM_1_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}.  You may not grant action points to yourself with this effect.  Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.description: Consume Strength will now also cause the victim to lose 50 Action Points.

data.name: Khaine's Blessing
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, your autoattack speed is increased by 50% for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Any time you critically hit an enemy, your autoattack speed is increased by {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1}% for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Khaine's Bounty
data.description: Any time your direct heal critically heals an ally, you will become surrounded by a protective barrier for up to 30 seconds which will absorb up to 475 damage.
data.rawDescription: Any time your direct heal critically heals an ally, you will become surrounded by a protective barrier for up to {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} which will absorb up to {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE}.

data.name: Khaine's Embrace
data.description: All of your groupmates within 100 feet of you regain 350 health.
data.rawDescription: All of your groupmates within 100 feet of you regain {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH}.

data.name: Khaine's Imbuement
data.description: Any time you hit an enemy, there is a 25% chance that they will suffer an additional 453 Spirit damage over 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Any time you hit an enemy, there is a 25% chance that they will suffer an additional {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_SPIRITDAMAGE} over {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Khaine's Invigoration
data.description:
A quick heal that restores 461 health.
Not affected by cooldown modification abilities.
data.rawDescription:
A quick heal that restores {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH}.
Not affected by cooldown modification abilities.

data.name: Khaine's Refreshment
data.description: You throw yourself open to Khaine's influence as power rushes through you for up to 3 seconds.  Each second, all allies within 30 feet of you will regain 179 health, and you will lose 20 Soul Essence.  This effect will end if you lose your concentration, or run out of Soul Essence to power it with.
data.rawDescription: You throw yourself open to Khaine's influence as power rushes through you for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.  Each second, all allies within {COM_3_RADI_FEET} of you will regain {COM_3_VAL0_HEALTH}, and you will lose {COM_2_VAL1} Soul Essence.  This effect will end if you lose your concentration, or run out of Soul Essence to power it with.

data.name: Khaine's Vigor
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet of you gradually regains 567 health over 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: All group mates within 100 feet of you gradually regains {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Khaine's Withdrawal
data.description: Removes all Ailments and Hexes from your group.
data.rawDescription: Removes all Ailments and Hexes from your group.

data.name: Lacerate
data.description: A gory strike that Cripples your enemy, dealing 76 damage initially and another 115 damage over 10 seconds and reducing their Toughness by 75.
data.rawDescription: A gory strike that Cripples your enemy, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} initially and another {COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} and reducing their Toughness by {COM_2_VAL0_COM_1_VAL0}.

data.name: Life's End
data.description: For 10 seconds, you allow your group mates within 100 feet (instead of yourself) to feast on the life essence of your victims, healing everyone for 50% of the melee damage you deal.
data.rawDescription: For 10 seconds, you allow your group mates within 100 feet (instead of yourself) to feast on the life essence of your victims, healing everyone for 50% of the melee damage you deal.

data.name: Murderous Intent
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 10% and your chance to parry by 10%, but reduces the effectiveness of your casted healing abilities by 20%.
data.rawDescription: Increases your chance to critically hit by {COM_2_VAL1}% and your chance to parry by {COM_1_VAL0}%, but reduces the effectiveness of your casted healing abilities by {COM_0_VAL1}%.

data.name: Patch Wounds
data.note:
Requires 25 Soul Essence
Target must be Hexed or Ailing
data.description: You patch an ally's wound and remove one Ailment or Hex.
data.rawDescription: You patch an ally's wound and remove one Ailment or Hex.

data.name: Pillage Essence
data.description: A strike into your target's soul which deals 202 damage and causes them to lose 50 Action Points.  You will gain additional Soul Essence for most of the action points that the enemy lost.
data.rawDescription: A strike into your target's soul which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and causes them to lose {COM_1_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}.  You will gain additional Soul Essence for most of the action points that the enemy lost.

data.name: Potent Covenants
data.description: Increases the chance for your Covenants to trigger by an additional 15%.
data.rawDescription: Increases the chance for your Covenants to trigger by an additional 15%.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET}, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Rend Soul
data.description:
You repeatedly assault an enemy, shredding their soul energy and twisting it to your own purposes. You strike the target up to four times over 3 seconds, dealing 84 Spirit damage per hit. Each hit heals your defensive target for 350% of the damage that was dealt.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Soul Essence.
data.rawDescription:
You repeatedly assault an enemy, shredding their soul energy and twisting it to your own purposes. You strike the target up to four times over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, dealing {COM_2_VAL0_SPIRITDAMAGE} per hit. Each hit heals your defensive target for 350% of the damage that was dealt.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Soul Essence.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 Action Points over 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_ACTIONPOINTS} over {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.description: Dark forces restore 258 health to an ally immediately, and another 315 over 5 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Dark forces restore {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH} to an ally immediately, and another {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} over {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.description: Whenever you directly heal an ally, there is a 25% chance that they will regain 50 Action Points, but this effect will not work on you.
data.rawDescription: Whenever you directly heal an ally, there is a 25% chance that they will regain {COM_1_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}, but this effect will not work on you.

data.description: A slice aimed at fresh wounds which deals 177 damage.  If the enemy was Crippled, then they are further Crippled and take an additional 185 damage over 15 seconds.
data.rawDescription: A slice aimed at fresh wounds which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}.  If the enemy was Crippled, then they are further Crippled and take an additional {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Soul Infusion
data.description: Your target is gradually infused with 1700 health over 15 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Your target is gradually infused with {ABIL_3366_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_HEALTH} over {ABIL_3366_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.description: All group mates within 100 feet becomes surrounded by a magical barrier for 10 seconds, which will absorb up to 775 damage for each person.
data.rawDescription: All group mates within 100 feet becomes surrounded by a magical barrier for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, which will absorb up to {COM_0_VAL1_DAMAGE} for each person.

data.name: Stand, Coward!
data.description: Life is restored to a dead ally, and 20% of their health is recovered in the hopes they will prove less worthless to you in the future.
data.rawDescription: Life is restored to a dead ally, and 20% of their health is recovered in the hopes they will prove less worthless to you in the future.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 900 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for half of the damage dealt.
data.rawDescription: Your target suffers {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over 9 seconds, and you are healed for half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Subtlety
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 25% less than normal.
data.rawDescription: Enemy monsters will hate you 25% less than normal.

data.name: Terrifying Vision
data.description: Your enemy is distracted by malevolent spirits, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage against you for 15 seconds.  You will stop attacking when you use this ability, and the effect will fade if you attack someone that you have detaunted.
data.rawDescription: Your enemy is distracted by malevolent spirits, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only {COM_0_VAL0}% damage against you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.  You will stop attacking when you use this ability, and the effect will fade if you attack someone that you have detaunted.

data.name: Thousand and One Dark Blessings
data.description: All of your group mates within 100 feet have their armor increased by 825, Block, Parry, Dodge and Disrupt by 25, and all Resists by 315 for the next 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: All of your group mates within 100 feet have their armor increased by {COM_0_VAL0}, Block, Parry, Dodge and Disrupt by {COM_2_VAL0}, and all Resists by {COM_1_VAL0} for the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Transfer Essence
data.description: An unholy attack which deals 152 damage to your target and spills out a portion of their soul, healing any of your groupmates within 100 feet for 85% of the total ability damage plus 50% of the damage that you dealt.
data.rawDescription: An unholy attack which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your target and spills out a portion of their soul, healing any of your groupmates within 100 feet for 85% of the total ability damage plus 50% of the damage that you dealt.

data.name: Transferred Focus
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, your defensive target will receive 20% more incoming healing for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Any time you critically hit an enemy, your defensive target will receive {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1}% more incoming healing for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Uncaring Dismissal
data.description: A great energy washes over all targets in front of you, blowing back all enemy players within 30 feet and knocking down monsters.
data.rawDescription: A great energy washes over all targets in front of you, blowing back all enemy players within 30 feet and knocking down monsters.

data.name: Universal Confusion
data.description: Raw power erupts in a 30 feet area around you, inflicting 1200 damage and Staggering all enemies around you for 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.
data.rawDescription: Raw power erupts in a {COM_0_RADI_FEET} area around you, inflicting {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and Staggering all enemies around you for {ABIL_3707_COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Vision of Torment
data.description: Victim is overcome with seemingly endless visions of their own grisly death. So real are the visions, that the victim suffers 1596 damage over 7 seconds and will not generate any morale for every second of agony.
data.rawDescription: Victim is overcome with seemingly endless visions of their own grisly death. So real are the visions, that the victim suffers {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} and will not generate any morale for every second of agony.

data.name: Warding Strike
data.description:
A cunning strike which deals 152 damage to your enemy and reduces their chance to parry by 10% for 15 seconds.

Additionally, when wearing a shield your chance to block will be increased by 10% for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription:
A cunning strike which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your enemy and reduces their chance to parry by {COM_1_VAL0}% for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

Additionally, when wearing a shield your chance to block will be increased by {COM_3_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0}% for {COM_3_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Wracking Agony
data.description: A merciless attack which deals 127 damage to your enemy, or if they are below 50% hit points, instead inflicts 277 damage and will almost always critically hit.
data.rawDescription: A merciless attack which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your enemy, or if they are below 50% hit points, instead inflicts {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} and will almost always critically hit.

data.name: Execute
data.note:
Target must be below 50% health
Builds 30 Soul Essence
Requires Dual Wield
data.description: Deals 352 damage and will almost always deal critical damage to a wounded foe.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and will almost always deal critical damage to a wounded foe.

data.name: Drowning in Blood

data.rawDescription: Blood lust drives you on, your attacks will ignore 25% the victim's armor and the cooldowns of Path of Torture abilities will be reduced by 5 seconds during the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Soul Ward

Requires Shield
Requires 25 Soul Essence per second
data.description:
You channel a Soul Ward making you immune from any roots or snare effects and increasing Parry, Dodge and Disrupt of you and your Group by 10%. Each second your group is surrounded by a protective barrier absorbing up to 170 ranged damage.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Soul Essence.

This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Soul Essence.

data.name: Blood of my Blood
data.note:
Requires Shield
Requires 25 Soul Essence per second
data.description:
To defeat your enemies you need to empower your team, you will suffer 300 damage every second, any groupmates within 100ft will have 525 health restored to them.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Soul Essence.

To defeat your enemies you need to empower your team, you will suffer {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} every second, any groupmates within 100ft will have {COM_2_VAL0} health restored to them.

data.name: Unyielding Tormentor

data.name: Terrifying Aura
data.description: Terrifying Vision will also affect all enemies within 30 feet of you.
data.rawDescription: Terrifying Vision will also affect all enemies within {ABIL_3046_COM_0_RADI_FEET} of you.
